frameDefinitions: Generally without overall (translational) motion,  an Agent places a Theme at a location, the Goal, which is profiled.
The Creator creates a new entity, the Created_entity, possibly out of Components.
An Agent has placed a Theme in an accessible but somewhat out of the way Location for the purposes of maintaining it free from harm and illegitimate use while it is not being used.

Because it no longer functions adequately under the given circumstances, an Agent (or non-Agentive Cause) undertakes steps to change the structural makeup of a complex Entity with interdependent parts, for instance an institution or a system of laws.
An Item is attached by a Handle, via a Connector, to a Goal, or Items are attached to each other.
frameExamples: David <t>placed</t> his briefcase on the floor.
The Libyans were <t>generating</t> arms for export.
They want to <t>reform</t> the law on Sunday trading.
My thumb was <t>stuck</t> to the tube of glue.
He <t>arranged</t> the elements in the pattern that we now call the periodic table.
listRoleDefinitions: The <fen>Agent</fen> is the person (or other force) that causes the <fen>Theme</fen> to move.
The <fen>Theme</fen> is the object that changes location during the Placing.
The role <fen>Goal</fen> is the location where the <fen>Theme</fen> ends up. This role is profiled by words in this frame.
<fen>Time</fen> is when the Placing occurs
The <fen>Place</fen> indicates where the Placing occurs.
The Creator creates a created entity.
This role identifies the entity that the Agent intentionally creates.
This role identifes the Time when an Agent intentionally creates a new entity.
This role identifies the place ehere the Agent intentionally creates the new entity.
The <fen>Agent</fen> is the person who has placed the <fen>Theme</fen> in the <fen>Location</fen>.
The <fen>Theme</fen> is the object that is kept in a <fen>Location</fen> by the <fen>Agent</fen>
The location where the <fen>Theme</fen> is kept. Some, though not all, LUs in this frame incorporate this FE.
<fen>Time</fen> is the time period during which the <fen>Theme</fen> is stored.
The <fen>Place</fen> indicates where the Storing occurs.
The sentient entity that effects a change in the <fen>Entity</fen>.

This role denotes a complex, abstract, human-created entity with interdependent parts which has either deteriorated or is no longer adequate for its purpose given a change in circumstances and which the <fen>Agent</fen> therefore wants to modify.
This role is for non-human causes, such as a processes or institutions, responsible for reform.
The time at which the change of the <fen>Entity</fen> is caused.
The place where the reformation occurs.
<fen>Connector</fen> identifies the instrument used to attach and is usually expressed in a <ment>with</ment>-PP.
<fen>Item</fen> identifies the entity that comes to be attached to the <fen>Goal</fen>.
<fen>Items</fen> identifies the plural items that are tied together, resulting in their mutual attachment.
<fen>Goal</fen> identifies the location to which the <fen>Item</fen>(s) is attached.
The person who causes the <fen>Theme</fen> to be in a particular <fen>Configuration</fen>.
An entity that consists of  parts which can be put into a configuration relative to each other and/or relative to their environment.
A state that holds of the <fen>Theme</fen> or a relation that holds among the constituent parts of the <fen>Theme</fen> as a result of the arranging action.
The <fen>Time</fen> when the arranging takes place.
listRoleExamples: <fex>The waiter</fex> placed the food on the table.
The waiter placed <fex>the food</fex> on the table.
The waiter placed the food <fex>on the table</fex>.
Grass , which is sown with clover , provides rich pasture for cattle in summer and the clover is <fex>another plant which</fex> puts nitrogen into the soil .
Smithers had placed the table there <fex>the night before</fex>.
Particular attention will be devoted to recent proposals to reform <fex>UK competition policy</fex>.
Thus , <fex>radical reform</fex> restructures rape offences in ways that it is hoped will facilitate the prosecution process without jeopardising the interests of the accused .
The House of Representatives, on a bipartisan basis, sought to reform the program <fex>this year</fex>.
The tarp is  tied down <fex>with a rope</fex>.
<fex>A handle</fex>  was affixed to the door.
The boat remained anchored <fex>to the coastline</fex>.
